title: 1983년 Downs 사건
summary: 미국 Florida, FL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Downs. 판결일: 1983-10-19. 법원: District Court of Appeal of Florida.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Michael DOWNS v. STATE of Florida
**판결일**: 1983-10-19
**법원**: District Court of Appeal of Florida
**관할**: Florida, FL

**판사**: Anstead, Glickstein, Letts

## 변호인

Richard L. Jorandby, Public Defender, and Glenalee Kretschmer, Asst. Public Defender, West Palm Beach, for appellant., Jim Smith, Atty. Gen., Tallahassee, and Robert L. Bogen, Asst. Atty. Gen., West Palm Beach, for appellee.

## 인용

- 438 So. 2d 1057

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM.
We affirm appellant’s conviction of robbery with a firearm. However, based on Bell v. State, 437 So.2d 1057 (1983) affirming in part and reversing in part, 411 So.2d 319 (Fla. 5th DCA 1982), we reverse the conviction of possession of a firearm while engaged in a criminal offense.
ANSTEAD, C.J., and LETTS and GLICKSTEIN, JJ., concur.
...
